source: GSC MIxS/MIGS Bacteria ( https://genomicsstandardsconsortium.github.io/mixs/MIGSBacteria/ ), ENA Metadata Validation: Instrument ( ENA Metadata Validation: Instrument )

definition: Specify whether to expect single, paired, or other configuration of reads
examples: e.g. single-end, paired end or others

definition: The lib_source specifies the type of source material that is being sequenced
Sequencing technique intended for this library
Whether any method was used to select and/or enrich the material being sequenced
Number of reads in the library (sequencing depth) or  spots
Number of base pairs (nucleotides) in the library or  bases
Number of reads in the library (sequencing depth) after quality filtering
Number of base pairs (nucleotides) in the library after quality filtering
Targeted gene name for marker gene studies
Forward and reverse primer sequences used
